feed.title: Sohan’s Blog
feed.subtitle: I'll cover topics in AI and software engineering, share my projects and review AI papers in my blog.

entry.title: Hello!
entry.content:
In my blogs, I’ll be writing on exciting topics in computer vision, generative AI and software engineering. I’ll also be sharing updates on my projects and reviewing cutting-edge AI research papers. My blog posts will be entirely original with proper references listed promptly.

To know more about me, check out the About section

Stay tuned for more posts!
entry.summary: In my blogs, I’ll be writing on exciting topics in computer vision, generative AI and software engineering. I’ll also be sharing updates on my projects and reviewing cutting-edge AI research papers. My blog posts will be entirely original with proper references listed promptly.
